preference.name: WRKFLW_task_complete
preference.preference_description:
Defines the default selection some key components, in order to enable single-click in the "Perform" action for Tasks in the Workflow application in the rich client. The preference applies only to "Do" Tasks and "select-signoff-team" for Review and Route Tasks. If the value is true: - "Do" Tasks: the "Complete" value is selected by default in the "Done" radio buttons. - "select-signoff-team" for Review and Route Tasks: the "Ad-hoc done" checkbox is selected by default.
If the value is false, no value is pre-selected for either Tasks.
IMPORTANT: Setting the value to true also sets the associated Task result value (task_result property) to "complete" by default.
